events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position in our backend team.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering based on your software development experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering positions has been assigned to manage your application going forward.
The initial screening interview was conducted successfully, and your coding skills and project experience were discussed in detail.
Thank you for your prompt response to the interview feedback and for your continued interest in the Software Engineer role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th to further evaluate your problem-solving and coding abilities.
You have successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong expertise in software engineering principles.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 13th to discuss your fit with company culture and benefits.
Your HR interview was completed successfully, and you expressed enthusiasm about joining the team.
An official offer for the Software Engineer position has been sent to you including salary and benefits details.
We have received your positive feedback regarding the offer and your excitement about the opportunity.
You have officially accepted the job offer and are now officially joining the software engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started with orientation and setup to welcome you as a new Software Engineer.
The hiring process for the Software Engineer position has been successfully completed, and you are now a full-time member of the team.
